page.title: 05Housing types in Trent-Vale.
page.content: In this area there are many different types of housing.The great majority of houses are semi-detached with gardens. In some areas there are large detached houses and bungalows with big gardens. Towards Stoke town centre many streets are terraced houses with small back yards.Many streets have shops over which people live.There are no large blocks of flats in this area,although there is a small block of about thirty flats.Most housing is privately owned although there are two small council estates.Many of the terraced and older property date back to the Victorian days,but as we go out from the town centre the property is younger,dating from the 1940's up to housing that is being built in the 1980's.
